items.summary: Remove all mock data from frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx including hardcoded land records, pending transfers, and recent activity arrays, replacing them with actual data from useQueries hooks or empty state components when no data exists

Remove all mock data fallbacks from frontend/src/pages/PropertyDetailsPage.tsx including hardcoded ownership history, document lists, and verification status, ensuring the component only displays data from backend queries or shows appropriate empty states

Remove all mock data from frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx including hardcoded search results arrays, replacing them with actual search query results or empty state displays when no properties match the search criteria
Remove any stubbed or mock responses from frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts, ensuring all query hooks make genuine calls to the backend actor without fallback mock data
Add appropriate empty state components to DashboardPage.tsx, SearchPage.tsx, and PropertyDetailsPage.tsx that display user-friendly messages and call-to-action buttons when no data is available
